description: Several actresses leave 'French Oscars' ceremony after Roman Polanski wins prize for best director.
title: Roman Polanski: Actress walkout as he wins best director at 'French Oscars'
title_page: Roman Polanski: Actress walkout as he wins best director at 'French Oscars' - BBC News
maintext: Polanski himself told Paris Match in December that he had tried to distance himself from the calls for a boycott of his film. "For years people have tried to make me out as a monster. I'm used to the slander and I've grown a thick skin, which is as hard as a shell," he said.
